name: HH_OASIS_SUBM
description: Contains information on the submission of Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) data sets.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the OASIS data set.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OASIS_SUBM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: OASIS data set submission type.  Links to category list ZC_OASIS_SUBM_TYPE.  Submission, correction, resubmission, inactivation.

columns.name: OASIS_SUBM_INST_MK
columns.description: Instant at which OASIS data set is marked submitted.

columns.name: OAS_SUBM_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of user who submitted OASIS data set.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: OAS_SUBM_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OAS_SUBM_FILE_INST
columns.description: Instant at which OASIS submission was filed.

columns.name: OASIS_SUBMIT_QUE_C_NAME
columns.description: OASIS data set's position in submission queue.  Links to category list ZC_OASIS_SUBMIT_Q.

columns.name: QUEUE_HISTORY_C_NAME
columns.description: OASIS data set submission queue history.  Links to category table ZC_OASIS_SUBMIT_Q.
